title: Test Epic
description: Test epic for verification

title: Add tests for encryption/decryption functionality
description: Write comprehensive tests for encryption, decryption, key management, and error handling. Test key rotation and backward compatibility.

title: Knowledge Management & Tracking System Overhaul
description: Complete redesign of how notes, tasks, projects, issues, and epics are tracked, stored, and linked. Implement hierarchical file structure, markdown-based task tracking, auto-sync between systems, and ML engineer-friendly organization.

title: Design hierarchical file structure schema
description: Design the new directory structure, file naming conventions, and folder hierarchy. Define how epics, projects, tasks, and notes will be organized. Create specification document with examples.

title: Implement markdown task file generator
description: Create system to generate markdown files for tasks. Include frontmatter with metadata, task description, status updates, time tracking. Auto-sync from database.

title: Build epic/project file auto-updater
description: Implement system to auto-update epic.md and project.md files with task listings, progress tracking, status summaries. Update on any task change.

title: Create bidirectional Beads-SecondBrain sync
description: Implement automatic syncing between Beads issues and Second Brain tasks. Issue updates propagate to tasks, task completions close issues, links maintained automatically.

title: Implement smart file naming system
description: Create slug generation from titles, handle duplicates, rename files on title updates, maintain backward compatibility with old numeric names.

title: Build migration tool for existing data
description: Create migration script to reorganize existing notes, tasks, and projects into new structure. Preserve all data, update all links, create symlinks if needed.

title: Update CLI commands for new structure
description: Update all sb commands to work with new file structure. Add new commands for navigation, improve task/note/project creation UX.

title: Add link validation and auto-repair
description: Implement system to validate all links (task-project, note-task, issue-task). Auto-detect broken links, provide repair commands, maintain referential integrity.

title: Test Issue
description: Test issue for verification

title: Create visual dependency/progress dashboard
description: Build CLI dashboard showing epic/project progress, task dependencies, burndown charts. Add mermaid diagram generation for GitHub visualization.

title: Write documentation for new system
description: Document new file structure, CLI commands, linking system, best practices. Include migration guide, troubleshooting, examples.

title: Sensitive Data Encryption
description: Add encryption capabilities for sensitive information before pushing to GitHub. Support RSA key pair encryption/decryption for secure data storage.

title: Design encryption architecture and key management strategy
description: Design how encryption will work: RSA key pair generation, key storage location, what data to encrypt (notes, work logs, sensitive fields), encryption format, and backward compatibility.

title: Implement RSA key pair generation and management
description: Implement RSA key pair generation, secure storage of private key, and key management CLI commands (generate, rotate, export public key).

title: Add encryption layer for sensitive data fields
description: Add encryption capabilities to database and markdown storage. Encrypt sensitive fields before write, decrypt on read. Support marking fields/notes as sensitive.

title: Implement pre-commit hook for encryption validation
description: Create git pre-commit hook to verify no unencrypted sensitive data is being pushed. Scan for sensitive markers and ensure encryption.

title: Add CLI commands for encryption operations
description: Add CLI commands: 'sb encrypt <data>', 'sb decrypt <data>', 'sb key generate', 'sb key export', 'sb mark-sensitive <note-id>'. Include help docs.

title: Write documentation and setup guide for encryption
description: Document encryption setup, key management, best practices, and recovery procedures. Include examples and troubleshooting.
